#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int md = 1000000007;
const int N = 101;

int dp[2 * N][N][2][2][N + 7];
int v[] = {0, 1, 2, 4, 6};

int main()
{
  int t;
  scanf("%d", &t);
  for(int fre = 0; fre < N; ++fre) {
    for(int reg = 0; reg < 2 * N; ++reg) {
      for(int la = 0; la < 2; ++la) {
        for(int sla = 0; sla < 2; ++sla) {
          for(int pts = N + 6; pts >= 0; --pts) {

            int& res = (dp[reg][fre][la][sla][pts] = 0);
            if(pts >= 100) {
              res = 1;
              continue;
            }
            if(reg == 0) {
              res = 0;
              continue;
            }
            if(la + sla != 0) {
              res = (res + 0LL + dp[reg - 1][ fre][ 0][ la][ pts]);
              if(res >= md) res -= md;
            }
            if(fre > 0) {
              for(int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
                res = (res + 0LL + dp[reg][ fre - 1][ la][ sla][ pts + v[i]]);
                if(res >= md) res -= md;
              }
            }
            for(int i = 1; i < 5; ++i) {
              res = (res + 0LL + dp[reg - 1] [fre] [1][ la][ pts + v[i]]);
              if(res >= md) res -= md;
            }

          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
  while(t--) {
    int reg, fre;
    scanf("%d %d", &reg, &fre);

    printf("%d\n", dp[reg][ fre][ 1][ 1][ 0]);
  }
  return(0);
}
